metadata.synopsis: The Dock Guard Observer is standing peering over the dock where one of his subordinates just jumped into the water for apparently no reason. All lines are low grumbling, as if spoken to the dead man.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to Moonrise Docks -90; 5; -187Talk to the Dock Guard JumperUse Tadpole power to have him jump into the waterTalk to the Dock Guard Observer and tell him the other guard jumpedFollow the Observer into and out of the tower (it's controlled by anubis, so his movement does not update if he is not loaded)Observe him looking over the dock edge.

0.speaker: Zealot Arden
0.text: Must've found some booze among the supplies. Idiot.
0.context: NodeContext: Irritated, speaking to comrade who's just jumped into the water and sank

1.speaker: Zealot Arden
1.text: Least you could've done was strip off your gear first, fool.
1.context: NodeContext: Irritated, speaking to comrade who's just jumped into the water and sank

2.speaker: Zealot Arden
2.text: Don't think for a bloody second I'm going in there after you.
2.context: NodeContext: Irritated, speaking to comrade who's just jumped into the water and sank

3.speaker: Zealot Arden
3.text: I'd say a prayer for you, lad, but I honestly do not remember your name.
3.context: NodeContext: Irritated, speaking to comrade who's just jumped into the water and sank
